title: Teacher Appreciation Day, Bill Gates Divorce, Andrew Brown, Jr., Will Smith and more.
itunes:title: Teacher Appreciation Day, Bill Gates Divorce, Andrew Brown, Jr., Will Smith and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! Whatchu want, to what it is, to what it is, to what it gon be. The Chief Love Officer opens the eyes of a young lady to the conditioning tactics of a potential Sugar Daddy. Bill and Melinda Gates have filed for divorce. Yesterday Andrew Brown, Jr. was laid to rest. WTH happened to Mike Lowrey? Junior talks about the NFL Draft and the conversation leads to managing money when you get it. Shout out to all the educators today. Today in Closing Remarks, Steve talks about lies, opportunities and America.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
